LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="c7eab167868a4e66bf603d1076fb4255" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]You are the one who saved me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I will never forget your kindness.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c7eab167868a4e66bf603d1076fb4255" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]My name is [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Leaf03"/]Jin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am an adventurer
wandering the universe in search of
uncharted lands.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Menu_Unlocked_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="00890b8cd6e24924a5edb1dc344edb6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Adventurers never skip their training.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You can do most anything as long as
you can rely on your physical self.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="00890b8cd6e24924a5edb1dc344edb6e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="QuestionFaceOnly"/]Which brings me to another important
aspect[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] [System:Color name="Default"]of[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] Dandori Challenge training:[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
meditation[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Why don't you [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]give it a try[System:Color name="Default"]?
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="51d0bc04c42344f3b12afc812fc95c9d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]If you can visualize your Dandori well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I will
present you with a small reward.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_PreQuest_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="e5632891ca264604ab3a1b371b2b0343" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you like to try meditation?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am
confident it will help you to improve your
Dandori skills.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="f6deb41a58514fdcaaf45fc6ff572a67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Close your eyes.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Clear your mind.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
imagine the Dandori situations that you
have already experienced.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Continue_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="c39961b184144dad964a9bb238a50bbf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]What do you think?
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Return_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b59f9e38a33c45a0a210b106e0d29ab0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Let us meditate together again.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Outro_A01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="6163f04b4c374dd9a7b8b7443740c51f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Come by whenever you want to meditate.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You are always welcome.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Outro_B01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b6867acc12a24494a8e3323a61449892" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Now, good luck to you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Be sure to keep
the art of Dandori at the forefront of
your mind, and execute accordingly.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="225da759c7fb484da309fea1bb5dcc5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]It never occurred to me that I might meet
someone who looks exactly like me...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="225da759c7fb484da309fea1bb5dcc5f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]I have had adventures on so many planets,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
but I must acknowledge how surprised I am
by this unprecedented experience!
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b692c2592645427bad88c7de1d3ae590" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hahaha![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I can tell you are a truly good dog.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="15e1736969da4c95919cfbb5eed3ff65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Once,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] long ago,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I became stranded in a
dense jungle.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A dog that looked like you
appeared and guided me to the exit.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="15e1736969da4c95919cfbb5eed3ff65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Like a benevolent guardian of the jungle,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
that dog saved my life.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="69c7e8e2e5c54092adbe0bc3bfcda5c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Well done.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The simulation in your mind
seems to be quite thorough.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="eb98b3c417c94ec6b7810b552182e1c4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Mastering Dandori is a process that never
ends.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] The effort will continue to shape
you forever.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01: [Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="6dc43104303d49c9ac6a524a622c316c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Your skill is improving.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well done.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b23f4d0ee31c447e95635b04d3f0b948" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This is the result of all your effort and
training.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You should be proud of yourself.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="f6d9ea8a0098406fac9203022876d8ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]Oh my,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what is this?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f6d9ea8a0098406fac9203022876d8ee" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHandsFaceOnly"/]My apologies.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was not aware you had
already mastered the skill.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You caught
me by surprise.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="285213975a0745daa7d231cfc0ca0036" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I would like you to have that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am
impressed with how far you
have come.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b6154cde9ca54772a802f8ccb670a840" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]I see you are able to visualize well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You
really do have remarkable potential.

[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="02de717e6aab46fab1bccb526e914b80" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Please take that.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Continue to work hard,
and keep up with your training!
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="cc501a72808e4e72b8e873de4371c195" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]When I was leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I could not stop
thinking about the art of Dandori.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It was like an endless meditation.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="1cf92039ee5f4ed9abd7e3262ad0d366" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Observing a smart individual like you
motivates me to strive harder myself.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="8da14dd8e65740d59160def4db51945f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Hello there![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Do you feel as I do?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] That this
is the perfect weather for meditation.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="8ea16918ca524b09aca68537021b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I have been practicing self-discipline and
training to go on adventures since I was
quite small.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ea16918ca524b09aca68537021b2e17" Scale="1"/]I studied traditional sports as well as
combat sports,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] martial arts,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and the
art of battle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8ea16918ca524b09aca68537021b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]All these skills I have acquired have
sharpened me like a blade.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="d9172dcaebc8406998797593f534aa57" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I will not stop searching for uncharted
lands,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] because I believe adventures
should never have to end.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="a616ae4bbb9b4cb9ba693951c5503360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What do you think you need to be an
adventurer?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A strong body and perhaps
a resilient mind?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a616ae4bbb9b4cb9ba693951c5503360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Naturally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] these are important,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the
most important thing is to be able to
visualize Dandori scenarios in your mind.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a616ae4bbb9b4cb9ba693951c5503360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Simulate situations, and consider where
to start if there is a wall or how to react
if a creature attacks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You get the idea.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a616ae4bbb9b4cb9ba693951c5503360" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Go over different challenges,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and imagine
the best Dandori skills to use for each.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="c12e19aadfb84375b801725af48b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]My dream was to explore uncharted
planets as an adventurer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c12e19aadfb84375b801725af48b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But no new worlds had been found in
the time since I was born.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c12e19aadfb84375b801725af48b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Then I heard about this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was all
I could do not to shout and leap about with
excitement.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though I did restrain myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c12e19aadfb84375b801725af48b2e17" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Nothing was going to stop me from coming
here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was on my way before I even had
time to meditate on it.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="f5385686b61240b2ad1d255431e0722f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Adventure involves risk.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It is never a good
idea to charge blindly into things.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f5385686b61240b2ad1d255431e0722f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Listen.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The secret to mastering Dandori
is to define and organize.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="e27642bbb54a4dff83319637457576a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]In order to develop good Dandori skills,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it is important to visualize over and
over again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e27642bbb54a4dff83319637457576a9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]The more you imagine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the better the
solutions you can craft for each and
every situation.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="1a35c76e43884f3d98d17c053a07258e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I have never given up on something,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no
matter how many times bad luck sets
me back.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1a35c76e43884f3d98d17c053a07258e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]One must be resilient and keep visualizing
Dandori scenarios in order to figure out
the best solutions.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="e08f7d06b8ee4cfdb42be790cb50f24a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]There will be times when things just do not
go well even after several attempts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e08f7d06b8ee4cfdb42be790cb50f24a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]In situations like that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it is important to
remember to pause for breath,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] calm your
mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and try again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It can still work out.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="be5ee126dc3b4c13b65a2367cfed0610" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I have visited all kinds of worlds and
experienced countless adventures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be5ee126dc3b4c13b65a2367cfed0610" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]One planet covered in sand...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]another with
extreme weather...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Each one provided me
with unforgettable experiences.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be5ee126dc3b4c13b65a2367cfed0610" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And every time I faced difficulties,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I meditated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is how I have always
created new paths for myself.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="d1c351502d7a46dd9697b94c4b4a1fde" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The whole time I was leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my mind
was preoccupied with the art of Dandori.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d1c351502d7a46dd9697b94c4b4a1fde" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]All I could think about was how I might
improve the efficiency and speed with
which I completed tasks.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_00_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="b8b2c2ca9b6b4a0a93c4ed8ebd3fc00e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Adventurer as an occupation always
involves some risks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It requires excellent
Dandori mastery to protect yourself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b8b2c2ca9b6b4a0a93c4ed8ebd3fc00e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I believe this also applies to the Rescue
Corps.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Continue to explore more areas,
and hone your skills.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="cd5b39ff3489400b995d4bfe7d4c5489" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Now, relax first.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Then we will start
our meditation.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="6c6a0dcce68b4530afd7f002bdaa3dca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Would you like to try meditation?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am
confident it will help you to improve your
Dandori skills.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="f688ade3947d4e35b65fe08e79f65d04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What do you think you need to be an
adventurer?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] A strong body and perhaps
a resilient mind?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f688ade3947d4e35b65fe08e79f65d04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Naturally,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] these are important,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but the
most important thing is to be able to
visualize Dandori scenarios in your mind.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f688ade3947d4e35b65fe08e79f65d04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Simulate situations, and consider where
to start if there is a wall or how to react
if a creature attacks.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You get the idea.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f688ade3947d4e35b65fe08e79f65d04" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Go over different challenges,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and imagine
the best Dandori skills to use for each.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="34685224c3b347eaa74e1e03eb4d4b45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]My dream was to explore uncharted
planets as an adventurer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34685224c3b347eaa74e1e03eb4d4b45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly2"/]But no new worlds had been found in
the time since I was born.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34685224c3b347eaa74e1e03eb4d4b45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Then I heard about this planet.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It was all
I could do not to shout and leap about with
excitement.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though I did restrain myself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="34685224c3b347eaa74e1e03eb4d4b45" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Nothing was going to stop me from coming
here.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was on my way before I even had
time to meditate on it.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="db1de5de928e4d769c357086ae823c1f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]How are things going?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Can you visualize
Dandori situations in your mind?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Relax,
and give it your best effort.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="e1ab19ae35e04364b37b51c7ecc21b94" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Think of Dandori exercises you've done in
the past.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Perfect.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Now relax your body...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then relax your mind...
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="c191006db5dc40c1b7d4a9ebb25b39ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Adventure involves risk.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It is never a good
idea to charge blindly into things.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c191006db5dc40c1b7d4a9ebb25b39ce" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Listen.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The secret to mastering Dandori
is to define and organize.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="4d963487cbd642049f0743ce61321950" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]When I came to this planet,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] our spaceship
broke down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was thrown violently out as
it crashed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="4d963487cbd642049f0743ce61321950" Scale="1"/]As my body was slammed about by the
impact,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I realized I had to prepare myself
for the worst possible outcome.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="79802eebfb4a4ef7840520f001748105" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]I noticed the efforts you have been
making.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is truly wonderful!
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="06af0bd3007b4d12b9b59f343b199d19" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]How are things going?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Never forget that
meditation will help to enhance your mind
even more.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="cdd1ffd186b347caa7e82e811adb7d92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]In order to develop good Dandori skills,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
it is important to visualize over and
over again.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="cdd1ffd186b347caa7e82e811adb7d92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]The more you imagine,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the better the
solutions you can craft for each and
every situation.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="d8bcfed300a7462b8a69523e98e4e4ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]A leafling appeared in front of me after
the ship crashed and I had used up all of
my flagging energy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d8bcfed300a7462b8a69523e98e4e4ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]My intuition told me they were not a bad
person.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I also felt as though they were
determined to achieve something.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d8bcfed300a7462b8a69523e98e4e4ed" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]I am afraid I do not recall much of
what happened after that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as I lost
consciousness.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="82e298f4e7f54a618dfe080856907ca6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I see you are working on your Dandori
skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Splendid![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Let us aim even higher.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="be2e7a2d0a5c487d881df6c4adcbdaff" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Even if you struggle to visualize situations
clearly,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] never get frustrated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You need a
calm mind to deal with things.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="0c026ef1047f4347ba2bcf9f829570d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I have never given up on something,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] no
matter how many times bad luck sets
me back.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0c026ef1047f4347ba2bcf9f829570d5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]One must be resilient and keep visualizing
Dandori scenarios in order to figure out
the best solutions.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="61c6766c8be84541b55189c44dfdc02a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]There will be times when things just do not
go well even after several attempts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61c6766c8be84541b55189c44dfdc02a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]In situations like that,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it is important to
remember to pause for breath,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] calm your
mind,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and try again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It can still work out.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="aea587c64f9249bcbc4c05813331e3bf" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Surprise"/]You have come this far...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Let us pursue
excellence!
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Intro_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="062cdf5f0cde4022a47fe83823061bd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I believed that you would reach this level.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
It looks as if my judgment was accurate.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="9f280045870e4e4690944690903b7941" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I have visited all kinds of worlds and
experienced countless adventures.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f280045870e4e4690944690903b7941" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]One planet covered in sand...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]another with
extreme weather...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Each one provided me
with unforgettable experiences.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9f280045870e4e4690944690903b7941" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]And every time I faced difficulties,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I meditated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is how I have always
created new paths for myself.
LF003.LF003_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Leaf03"/][UE:Meta key="372647f080d64716bc6d44477b08aa46" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]The whole time I was leafified,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my mind
was preoccupied with the art of Dandori.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="372647f080d64716bc6d44477b08aa46" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]All I could think about was how I might
improve the efficiency and speed with
which I completed tasks.
